PLMXML.author: Teamcenter V11000.2.2.21_20170330.00 - Muhammad Paracha@DEV INT PRIMARY(-1928436840)

Item.value: Condition task to determine whether any dispatcher requests were created as part of the current Workflow. If Yes, WF is routed to "Validate Dispatcher" task and if no requests were created, WF is directly routed to the review tasks

Task will be executed by dcproxy. This task is to validate all the dispatcher requests submitted as part of this workflow have completed or not. The workflow will wait in this task, till all the dispatcher requests are completed.
If the workflow has reached this task and it means all/some of the dispatcher requests have failed.

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -comment=One or more of the Dispatcher Processes failed and JTs/PDFs were not generated. Please login to Teamcenter and check

Item.value: If the workflow has reached this task and it means all the dispatcher requests have completed successfully.

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -comment=JTs/PDFs generated and attached to source ItemRevisions. Please check it.

Item.value: Fill the ECN Disposition and Review the task

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -subject=ECN is Submitted for Optional Reviewer Review

Item.value: By Approving this task, Service Reviewers confirms Service Changes
By Approving this task, Producibility confirms Engineering recommended material dispositions are acceptable and Design ID is producible.
By Approving this task, Mfg Change Control confirms Cutin Changes

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -subject=ECN is Rejected and sending back to Requstor

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -comment=Correct the data and resubmit to ECN workflow

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -error_msg=The ECN is already in a workflow
